title: Unjust permabannning wave
body:
I've been just recently permabanned from league for use of 3rd party programs for cheats hacks etc. However I have never used anything outside of the riot approved Curse program. The only other one used is the razer cortex program but that is used for ingame recording and increasing FPS counts. If increasing my fps due to my lower end machine than anyone overclocking or getting better hard ware is doing worse than I am.

I have made a ticket but so far all they said was exactly what they said in the email. I can do and send whatever I have to to prove that I have NOT been cheating at this game. I have spent the last few years and over a thousand dollars on playing this game with my friends so I WANT my account back from this unjust ban

replies.body:
Ive seen tons of these on the na boards and they all have one thing in common. 

They all used curse
Pretty sure ages ago they said curse is banned didn't they? Back when curse introduced dragon timers etc...
Yea and they said they were working with curse to make it ok to use and that they will not ban people for using it

You'll never get unpermabanned.

3rd party software means anything that the client detected as non-standard.
That is why halfway through this season custom skins will be banned from use entirely, because people get mistakenly banned for them already.

Riot's stand on using Curse, or anything at all with your client is "use at your own risk" because the client registers anything that interferes with it as 3rd party cheating software, even things as innocent as custom skins.

Additionally Riot never lax on their permabans for this, or really anything that someone gets permabanned for.
It's really your own fault for using Curse.

You scripted, OP, deal with it.

The client that you used, and I know what you used, is detected and has been for some time. What the morons get for using injection in 2017.
riot have done this to like half of their player base. idk what theyre doing
